verbose_text: Also, AKT regulates the function of members of the Bcl-2 family, inhibits the formation of dimers of bcl-2, and promotes the inactivation of the pro apoptotic factor, Bax, to inhibit cell apoptosis [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: AKT regulates the function of members of the Bcl-2 family, inhibits the formation of dimers of bcl-2, and promotes the inactivation of the pro-apoptotic factor, Bax
